Game information:  

For more than twenty years, the sheep were an integral part
of a formidable arsenal of worms. And now, after many years
spent in slavery, they finally managed to break free! Escaping
from worms tyrants herd must pass many cars and a variety of
deadly traps, concentrated in the maze arms factory worms,
and after passing the test site, to get to the green pastures.


Flockers - a modern view of the genre of puzzles in which you
must get from one point to another, with a generous portion of
good seasoned with dark humor, sinister forebodings. Levels are
created in such a way as to challenge the skills and strategic
planning of players at a time when they are trying to hold their
flock by monstrous traps sadistic devices and diabolical puzzles.
Those who will be able to save the maximum number of sheep, will
be rewarded. Those who have become victims of the factory are
deadly machines will still be allowed to further passage.


RePack Features:  

Flockers
Do not cut / recoded
